release_note: This release brings compatibility and optimizations for iOS 16. Carbo requires iOS 14 or later.
Maintenance release with minor enhancements bug fixes.

ENHANCEMENTS BUG FIXES Full compatibility and enhancements with iOS 15 including transparent navigation bars and inset grouped table views. Fixed errouneous page overlay in the camera view that could be misaligned on some iPad devices. Minor fixes and enhancements.
Fixed a bug that could cause unwanted straight lines when sketching.

What s New in Carbo 2.0.2: Stability and performance improvements. What s New in Carbo 2: Carbo 2 brings all your iPad or iPhone created notes right into your Mac through a new Mac Catalyst app Optimized for Mac . Carbo enables handwriting drawing either from camera or Apple Pencil with outstanding real life like pixel free quality. This makes a lot of sense on iPad and iPhone as these are great input viewing devices but now these notes can also be accessed from the Mac through a refined Mac Catalyst app providing the full productive experience on all your Apple devices. macOS 11 Big Sur Universal app Carbo 2 comes as a universal app for iPhone iPad and Mac. Optimized for Mac Mac Catalyst app enhanced for macOS 11 look feel which provides a great user experience on the Mac. Modern style full height sidebar refreshed toolbar use of modern SF Symbols design language. Main menu adaptations contextual menus. Drag drop of notes tagging import export Spotlight search Metal based note rendering Metal is Mac only pixel free on all devices . iOS 14 ENHANCEMENTS Carbo 2 now offers photo import from the new more capable iOS 14 photo picker filter search etc. . This release also brings improved handling of user privacy with support for photo albums security constraints of iOS 14. iOS app requirement: iOS 13 or more recent. PURCHASE MODEL UPDATE Carbo 2 now comes as a free app in app purchase. New users can fully try the app for free with a limit of 10 notes and get the Premium Pack to remove that limit. Free upgrade for version 1.0 users. Pre existing users paid app keep all the features they already have without limitation.

Modernization for latest OS bug fixes Fixed a bug where a Dropbox notebook could fail to sync when the app was reactivated from the iOS Home screen.

Carbo 1.8 is now optimized for iOS 13. Dark Mode is supported throughout the app and enables notes that remain easy on the eyes in a dark environment. User interface has been fine tuned with latest iOS 13 enhancements.
Updated for the new iPad Pro Handling of new iPad Pro display sizes 11 and 12.9 Handling of new Apple Pencil double tap gesture: switch to eraser or last used tool.
Fixed a rare issue that could cause a crash at launch.
Updated for new iPhone sizes including iPhone XS Max and more . Minor fixes and enhancements for iOS 12.
Updated the crash reports framework.

This release of Carbo adds compliance with European Union s General Data Protection Regulation GDPR . In particular for a notebook stored in a 3rd party service iCloud Dropbox and Evernote this release ensures that you can: 1. Get a copy of all the notes stored in the notebook: Select the notebook in the sidebar. Select any note with a long press. Tap on the Select All button. Tap on the archive button to create a local archive file containing the note images and their metadata in human readable form. 2. Completely delete the data stored in the third party service associated with the notebook. Select the notebook in the sidebar. Select any note with a long press. Tap on the Select All button. Tap on the delete button. 3. Temporarily deactivate access to the third party service associated with the notebook. Go to Settings Notebooks. Switch off the notebook.
More robust palm rejection to avoid leaving marks when resting the palm while drawing with the Apple Pencil.
Inko Compatibility: added support for dragging notes to our new collaborative whiteboard app Inko . Fixed a bug that caused the editing tool offset setting Settings General Options to be ignored.
Fixed a crash that could occur on iOS 11.2 when cropping a picture. Improvements to touch gesture handling when drawing moving or zooming in the canvas.
Updated to support iPhone X.
Fixed a bug that could crash the app on 32 bit devices.
iOS 11 related bug fixes.

NEW FEATURES AND IMPROVEMENTS Optimized for iOS 11. Support for iOS 11 Drag and Drop Tagging moving notes: notes can be dropped on a specific tag in the sidebar which will tag them. Dragging notes to another store iCloud Dropbox etc. in the sidebar will move them to that store. internal dragging: iPhone and iPad Importing picture: dragging a picture from another app into Carbo will create a new note from it. Dragging it directly into a specific store iCloud Dropbox etc. in the sidebar will create the note in that store. iPad only Exporting a drawing: when a note is opened in the style chooser it can be exported with that style into another app by dragging it. iPad only Exporting multiple notes: multiple notes can be dragged simultaneously from the main list and exported to another app. iPad only ENHANCEMENTS Improved Apple Pencil support sketch shape rendering Fixed a bug that could cause the picture to flicker when zooming in the picture of a note. WORKFLOWS Carbo is getting extensive support for iOS 11 Drag Drop in various contexts import export notes and internal app use like tagging changing note storage . It s very visual and a useful addition to the core features.
Fixed crash at launch that could occur in rare circumstances when signing out of iCloud.
Updated Dropbox integration for future proofing.

Fixed a crash occurring while taking a picture when Save Pictures to Album option is set. Fixed an issue with photos not always saved in Carbo s album when Save Pictures to Album is set. Fixed a crash that could occur when drawing on devices with a version of iOS below 9.1.

BUG FIXES Fixed incorrect aspect ratio when exporting in PDF format. Fixed animations effects glitches that were impacting devices running iOS 10. IMPROVEMENTS Filename of exported image has been made unique to avoid naming collisions for same day notes.

Improved Apple Pencil Support: High speed sampling 240 Hz for 4x more accurate sketches. Predictive sampling for reduced perceived lag while drawing. Accurate handling of deferred orientation pressure information coming through pencil wireless connection. iOS 10 Features: Added support for iOS 10 Spotlight Search Continuation: continue in app searching from Spotlight initiated search. Haptic feedback for iPhone 7 for editing operations. Swift 3 modernization. Optimization bug fixes.

Added a privacy usage description when asking the permission to access camera and photo library. Fixed a bug that grew memory usage when using multiple notes and that could crash the app. Improved compatibility and stability with upcoming iOS release.
Fixed a bug that could prevent some extensions from working when exporting notes.

APPLE PENCIL IPAD PRO IMPROVEMENTS Carbo now offers 3 distinctive drawing tools: 2 fixed thickness drawing tool best for regular handwriting sketches in addition to a new calligraphic drawing tool styled handwriting like a flow pen . Calligraphic tool reacts to pencil angle speed and pressure. Drawing method has been refined for all tools and drawing artefacts removed. Drawing heads are now thinner to better enjoy Apple Pencil precision and now provide absolute sizing in all cases thickness does not depend on zoom level . Eraser tool is now more sensitive to pencil angle. It becomes larger when pencil is lowered with interactive display of eraser head. OTHER IMPROVEMENTS Better use of display surface. Margin have been removed to provide more room to content Improved fullscreen mode. Top toolbar and drawing tools are now completely removed when entering fullscreen mode for a better viewing editing experience.
Fixed a crash that could happen when syncing clock with a time server. Minor bug fixes.
Fixed an issue that was preventing selection tool from working properly.
Fixed an issue that prevented the introduction video from being played.

Major new release of Carbo including new drawing capabilities iPad Pro Apple Pencil iPhone 6s 3D Touch support which offers great interaction with Carbo hybrid pixel free rendering technology. NEW FEATURES Sketching notes directly within Carbo is now possible using either finger or pencil. This highly accurate drawing technology reacts to velocity pressure more. Added an option for creating empty notes. Added Pen tool for drawing. Added an Erase All tool to clear entire canvas. HARDWARE SUPPORT Support for iPad Pro Pencil input including sensitivity to speed pressure input angle as well as improved accuracy over touch. Support for iPhone 6s 6s Plus pressure sensitive 3D Touch display. Other devices without pressure capability: support for variable thickness based on drawing velocity. BUG FIXES Fixed an issue that could prevent Carbo from synchronizing notes with iCloud. Fixed layout issues that could happen when rotating the iPad.

OPTIMIZED FOR iOS 9 iOS 9 Required Carbo 1.1 Support for iOS 9 App Search you can search Carbo notes globally on your iPhone iPad. Support for iOS 9 Siri Remind me about this for Carbo notes. Support for iOS 9 iPad Multitasking Slide Over Split View . Support for iOS 9 3D Touch Quick Actions for iPhone 6s 6s Plus. Improved iCloud support based on iOS 9 silent push notifications instead of polling for quicker battery friendly note syncing. ENHANCEMENTS Faster app startup.
Fixed issues experienced on a beta OS.

IMPROVEMENTS Improved Chinese Spanish localizations Carbo is now accessible to other app export image to Carbo through Open In Deleting a note now requires user confirmation Added support for transparent PNG input BUG FIXES In call status bar layout fixes Fixed a problem that could cause a crash with Dropbox notebooks Fixed a number of rare crashes Fixed iOS 9 related crashes
